name: Oxfam America
mission:
Oxfam is a global organization that fights inequality to end poverty and injustice. We offer lifesaving
support in times of crisis and advocate for economic justice, gender equality, and climate action. We
demand equal rights and equal treatment so that everyone can thrive, not just survive. The future is
equal.
theoryOfChange: Oxfam America operates under a "Global Strategic Framework 2020-2030" which guides their efforts to fight inequality and end poverty and injustice. This framework emphasizes collaborating and innovating globally, and shifting resources and power to marginalized communities. Additionally, Oxfam has developed a "Corporate Inequality Framework (CIF)" to help investors analyze how companies contribute to inequality. There is also a "Theory of Change Co-Created by Young People: Youth-led input to Oxfam's Youth Participation and Leadership Meta Theory of Change," which was developed through co-creation workshops and serves as a foundational reference for youth programming strategies. Oxfam America also implements rigorous monitoring, evaluation, and learning (MEL) systems for all long-term programs, major campaigns, and key innovation projects, including baselines, monitoring reports, annual reviews, and evaluations.

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

components.evidence: Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.improvement_suggestion: Add a dedicated zakat page or clearly state whether donations are zakat-eligible.
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

alignment.rationale: Alignment 36/50: MEDIUM Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

score_details.score_summary: Oxfam AmericaHQ shows exceptional impact and strong alignment.

zakat.claim_evidence: Organization is in zakat denylist (partners but doesn't collect directly) (Source: https://www.oxfamamerica.org/)

all_citations.claim: Oxfam America holds a Charity Navigator score of 99.33333333333333/100, reflecting high accountability and financial health.
The organization works with local partners to provide lifesaving support and development programs.
all_citations.source_name: Download our most recent financial audit

all_citations.claim: Oxfam programs in Ghana resulted in new laws being passed with input from civil society organizations.
all_citations.source_name: Download NORAD Ghana Final Project Evaluation Report

all_citations.claim: Legislative amendments were adopted in Tanzania as a result of Oxfam-supported advocacy.
all_citations.source_name: Download NORAD Tanzania Final Project Evaluation Report

all_citations.claim: Oxfam America offers various donation options for supporters to contribute to global poverty relief.
The organization reported total revenue of $83,115,051 and maintains a program expense ratio of 72.3%.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Oxfam America earns a high overall rating due to its exceptional financial health and proven track record in legislative advocacy and humanitarian relief. The organization demonstrates high transparency and efficient use of donor funds for sadaqah-eligible contributions.
areas_for_improvement: Enhancing donor alignment for specific niche philanthropic groups
Expanding direct provision metrics across all regional programs

dimension_explanations.alignment: With an alignment score of 36/50, Oxfam America shows a strong track record in urgent humanitarian causes, though it maintains a medium donor fit for specific religious giving profiles [1]. As a sadaqah-eligible charity, it provides a transparent pathway for general charitable giving toward global poverty relief [6].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization achieves a high impact score of 46/50 by utilizing a program expense ratio of 72.3% to drive direct provision of services [1][7]. Evidence of effectiveness is seen in regional projects, such as in Ghana where new laws were passed with civil society input and in Tanzania where legislative amendments were successfully adopted [3][5].

baseline_narrative.headline: Oxfam America empowers local communities to lead their own development through international relief and economic justice initiatives.
strengths: High financial accountability with a Charity Navigator score of 99.33333333333333/100
Strong operational liquidity with 8.0 months of working capital
Efficient fundraising operations costing only $0.19 per $1 raised
baseline_narrative.summary: Oxfam America is a global organization that partners with local entities to provide lifesaving support and advocate for economic justice [1][2]. In the most recent fiscal period, the organization reported a total revenue of $83,115,051 to fund its mission of poverty alleviation and community empowerment [7].

all_citations.claim: lifesaving support, economic justice, and climate action
all_citations.quote: Programs: Lifesaving Support, Economic Justice, Gender Equality, Climate Action
Oxfam works with local organizations, providing funds and empowering poor people

all_citations.claim: passing new laws with CSO input
all_citations.quote: New laws passed with CSO input: 2

all_citations.claim: Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid

all_citations.quote: Improvement: Add a dedicated zakat page

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Oxfam America earns a high overall rating due to its exceptional financial health and proven track record in legislative advocacy and humanitarian relief. The organization demonstrates high transparency and efficient use of donor funds for sadaqah-eligible contributions.

areas_for_improvement.context: At <cite id="7">72.3%</cite>, the program ratio is lower than the <cite id="16">peer median of 77.5%</cite>, suggesting higher administrative or advocacy costs.
The organization has seen a <cite id="17">3-year revenue CAGR of -9.1%</cite>, indicating a contraction in funding that may limit future expansion.

bbb_assessment.summary: Oxfam America is an Accredited Charity meeting all standards for accountability.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The organization's high reserves (8 months) mitigate short-term risks from revenue dips.
risk_factors: <cite id="17">-9.1% 3-year revenue CAGR</cite> suggests funding volatility.
<cite id="7">72.3% program ratio</cite> is below the 75% industry standard.
case_against.summary: The primary concerns involve <cite id="17">declining revenue trends</cite> and a <cite id="7">program expense ratio</cite> that lags behind industry peers.

data_gaps: Negative revenue growth trend requires monitoring
confidence.notes: Very high data availability with recent audited financials.

alignment.improvement: Alignment could be improved by <cite id="22">adding a dedicated page</cite> clarifying the sadaqah-only nature of their funding to better guide Muslim donors.

credibility.explanation: Oxfam is a highly credible institution with <cite id="1">over 80 years of history</cite>, a <cite id="10">Platinum Candid Seal</cite>, and <cite id="18">100% independent board members</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To further enhance credibility, the organization could work to reverse the <cite id="17">-9.1% revenue decline</cite> to demonstrate growing public trust.

impact.explanation: Impact is high due to <cite id="19">direct provision models</cite> and a cost-effectiveness of <cite id="20">$79.01 per beneficiary</cite> in advocacy contexts.
impact.improvement: The charity could improve its impact score by raising its <cite id="7">program expense ratio</cite> closer to the <cite id="16">77.5% peer median</cite>.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade A - Verified outcomes and published evaluations

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Empowering local organizations to lead development

rich_narrative.headline: Oxfam America empowers local communities to lead their own development through international relief and economic justice initiatives.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who value systemic advocacy alongside direct relief and prefer supporting an established, highly transparent global institution.
donor_motivations: Want to address the root causes of poverty through policy change
Value high-level transparency and independent board oversight
Prefer organizations with significant operational reserves for stability
Support local empowerment models over top-down aid
giving_considerations: A significant portion of funds supports advocacy and research
Recent revenue trends show a contraction in scale
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors specifically seeking to fulfill zakat obligations or those who prioritize a 90%+ program expense ratio.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade A reflects <cite id="13">verified outcome tracking</cite> and multiple <cite id="3">external evaluation reports</cite>.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Oxfam uses an integrated approach combining <cite id="3">lifesaving support with economic justice</cite> to combat poverty at all levels.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Rigorous evidence ensures that advocacy translates into tangible legislative and social changes.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: Despite declining revenue, the scale of global poverty and climate crises provides ample room for increased funding.

organizational_capacity.geographic_reach: Global (North America, Africa, Asia, Europe, South America)

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by its <cite id="15">large-scale grantmaking</cite> ($19.4M foreign) and <cite id="8">8.0 months of capital</cite>.
similar_orgs: Helping Hand for Relief and Development

similar_organizations.differentiator: Specific focus on orphan and medical care
similar_organizations.name: Helping Hand for Relief and Development

strengths.detail: Oxfam holds a <cite id="6">99.33/100 rating from Charity Navigator</cite> and a <cite id="10">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite>, reflecting top-tier reporting standards.
The charity maintains <cite id="8">8.0 months of working capital</cite>, providing a robust buffer for long-term programming.
The organization spends only <cite id="11">$0.19 to raise every $1</cite>, ensuring more resources are available for advocacy and relief.

strengths_deep_dive: Oxfam America distinguishes itself through a sophisticated <cite id="12">theory of change</cite> that integrates direct service with systemic advocacy. Their impact is not merely anecdotal; they track <cite id="13">five distinct outcome metrics</cite> via Candid and publish detailed evaluation reports. For example, in Mozambique, their Civilinfo platform reached <cite id="14">5,661 unique viewers</cite> to improve information access, while in Ghana, their interventions led to <cite id="9">two new laws passed with civil society input</cite>. This focus on structural change is supported by a <cite id="15">large, independent board of 22 members</cite> who oversee a complex global operation spanning over 90 countries.
rich_narrative.summary: Oxfam America is a global humanitarian organization that has been <cite id="1">operating since 1942</cite> to address the root causes of poverty and inequality. The organization reported <cite id="2">$83,115,051 in total revenue</cite> for the 2024 fiscal year, utilizing these funds to support <cite id="3">lifesaving support, economic justice, and climate action</cite> across North America, Africa, Asia, and beyond. Unlike many traditional relief agencies, Oxfam focuses on <cite id="4">empowering local organizations</cite> to lead their own development, a strategy reflected in its <cite id="5">$19,868,856 in total grants</cite> distributed to domestic and foreign partners. The organization maintains a <cite id="6">99.33/100 overall score from Charity Navigator</cite>, signaling exceptional accountability and transparency. While its <cite id="7">program expense ratio is 72.3%</cite>, which is slightly below the peer median, its high <cite id="8">working capital of 8.0 months</cite> ensures significant operational resilience in volatile crisis zones. Oxfam's impact is evidenced through specific outcomes, such as <cite id="9">passing new laws with CSO input</cite> and training journalists to improve governance in regions like Ghana and Tanzania.
